DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates 4 different methods to aid surgeons visualize ureteral jets on cystoscopy.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Ureteral Jets on Cystoscopy
DOC.detailed_description: This study proposes to test and compare the surgeon's impression/confidence in identifying ureteral jets using 3 other methods in contrast to standard diagnostic cystoscopy: 1) cystoscopy with Dextrose 10% solution, 2) cystoscopy with phenazopyridine and 3) IV sodium fluorescein 4) standard cystoscopy with saline.
DOC.criteria: adult undergoing a cystoscopy or as part of their planned procedure Chronic kidney disease known prior surgical removal of kidney or ureteral obstruction Current ureteral stent placed Allergy to any of the interventions
